colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (ZHES PHYAG NA RDO RJE'I SGO NAS PHYUGS KYI GOD KHA GCOD THABS NYER @007A *, ,'TSE KUN 'JOMS ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, BDAG GI BLA MA RGYUD PA MKHAN PO RDO RJE 'CHANG SBYIN DAR MTSAN CAN GYIS, DENG SANG YUL PHYOGS 'GA' ZHIG TU PHYUGS YAMS DAR YOD PAS GCOD THABS ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL MA MDZAD PA BZHIN, MKHAN PO CHOS RJE DPAL LDAN MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
